Function oColumn_Titel AS Object oColumn_Titel=oGrid_Ansprechpartner.getByName("Titel") End Function

Function oField_MwSt_Satz AS Object oField_MwSt_Satz=oForm_Kontaktdaten.getByName("Field_MwSt_Satz") End Function

Function lKontaktID AS long lKontaktID=CLng(oField_KontaktID.Value) End Function
Function lKontaktID_import AS long sSQL1="SELECT Max(KontaktID) FROM "& sLieferanten oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() lKontaktID_import=oRecord1.getLong(1) Wend End Function
Function fAnzahlDatensaetzeKontakte AS integer Dim oRecord1 AS Object Dim sSQL1 AS String sSQL1="SELECT count(*) FROM "& sLieferanten &" WHERE KontaktID="& lKontaktID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() fAnzahlDatensaetzeKontakte=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Function GetDocUserProperty(sPropertyName AS String) AS String Dim oUserProps AS Object ' On Error Resume Next oUserProps = oDoc.DocumentProperties.getUserDefinedProperties() if oUserProps.getPropertySetInfo().hasPropertyByName(sPropertyName) = True then GetDocUserProperty = oUserProps.getPropertyValue(sPropertyName) else GetDocUserProperty = "" end if End Function
